GitLab.Code.CI.GitLabCIStatusMacro.description=This macros display the status of the specified git CIs, and compares it to the installed module version. \n\nThose CIs can be configured in the {0}. \n\nIt is recommended to use a cache macro in order to improve performance. GitLab.Code.CI.GitLabCIStatusMacro.description.administrationPanelLinkTitle=administration panel GitLab.Code.CI.GitLabCIStatusMacro.UsageTitle=Usage GitLab.Code.CI.GitLabCIStatusMacro.ExampleTitle=Example
GitLab.Code.CI.GitLabCIStatusMacro.authorizationError=Authorization for {0} is invalid. Authentication configuration is probably invalid. GitLab.Code.CI.GitLabCIStatusMacro.badResponseCodeError=Response code for {0} is invalid ({1}). Git url is probably invalid. GitLab.Code.CI.GitLabCIStatusMacro.genericError=Exception for {0} is invalid. Git url is probably invalid.
GitLab.Code.CI.GitLabCIStatusMacro.commitNotFound=Could not find last commit. Check url and branch name.
